verses.plain: I will love thee, O LORD, my strength.

tokens.t: I will love thee, O
, my strength.

verses.plain: The LORD is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my strength, in whom I will trust; my buckler, and the horn of my salvation, and my high tower.

tokens.t: The
my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my strength, in whom I will trust; my buckler, and the horn of my salvation,
my high tower.

verses.plain: I will call upon the LORD, who is worthy to be praised: so shall I be saved from mine enemies.

tokens.t: I will call upon the
to be praised: so shall I be saved from mine enemies.

verses.plain: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the floods of ungodly men made me afraid.

tokens.t: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the floods of ungodly men made me afraid.

verses.plain: The sorrows of hell compassed me about: the snares of death prevented me.

tokens.t: The sorrows of hell compassed me about: the snares of death prevented me.

verses.plain: In my distress I called upon the LORD, and cried unto my God: he heard my voice out of his temple, and my cry came before him, even into his ears.

tokens.t: In my distress I called upon the
, and cried unto my God: he heard my voice out of his temple, and my cry came before him,
into his ears.

verses.plain: Then the earth shook and trembled; the foundations also of the hills moved and were shaken, because he was wroth.

tokens.t: Then the earth shook and trembled; the foundations also of the hills moved and were shaken, because he was wroth.

verses.plain: There went up a smoke out of his nostrils, and fire out of his mouth devoured: coals were kindled by it.

tokens.t: There went up a smoke out of his nostrils, and fire out of his mouth devoured: coals were kindled by it.

verses.plain: He bowed the heavens also, and came down: and darkness was under his feet.

tokens.t: He bowed the heavens also, and came down: and darkness
under his feet.

verses.plain: And he rode upon a cherub, and did fly: yea, he did fly upon the wings of the wind.

tokens.t: And he rode upon a cherub, and did fly: yea, he did fly upon the wings of the wind.

verses.plain: He made darkness his secret place; his pavilion round about him were dark waters and thick clouds of the skies.

tokens.t: He made darkness his secret place; his pavilion round about him
dark waters
thick clouds of the skies.

verses.plain: At the brightness that was before him his thick clouds passed, hail stones and coals of fire.

tokens.t: At the brightness
before him his thick clouds passed, hail
and coals of fire.

verses.plain: The LORD also thundered in the heavens, and the Highest gave his voice; hail stones and coals of fire.

tokens.t: The
also thundered in the heavens, and the Highest gave his voice; hail
and coals of fire.

verses.plain: Yea, he sent out his arrows, and scattered them; and he shot out lightnings, and discomfited them.

tokens.t: Yea, he sent out his arrows, and scattered them; and he shot out lightnings, and discomfited them.

verses.plain: Then the channels of waters were seen, and the foundations of the world were discovered at thy rebuke, O LORD, at the blast of the breath of thy nostrils.

tokens.t: Then the channels of waters were seen, and the foundations of the world were discovered at thy rebuke, O
, at the blast of the breath of thy nostrils.

verses.plain: He sent from above, he took me, he drew me out of many waters.

tokens.t: He sent from above, he took me, he drew me out of many waters.

verses.plain: He delivered me from my strong enemy, and from them which hated me: for they were too strong for me.

tokens.t: He delivered me from my strong enemy, and from them which hated me: for they were too strong for me.

verses.plain: They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the LORD was my stay.

tokens.t: They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the
was my stay.

verses.plain: He brought me forth also into a large place; he delivered me, because he delighted in me.

tokens.t: He brought me forth also into a large place; he delivered me, because he delighted in me.

verses.plain: The LORD rewarded me according to my righteousness; according to the cleanness of my hands hath he recompensed me.

tokens.t: The
rewarded me according to my righteousness; according to the cleanness of my hands hath he recompensed me.

verses.plain: For I have kept the ways of the LORD, and have not wickedly departed from my God.

tokens.t: For I have kept the ways of the
, and have not wickedly departed from my God.

verses.plain: For all his judgments were before me, and I did not put away his statutes from me.

tokens.t: For all his judgments
before me, and I did not put away his statutes from me.

verses.plain: I was also upright before him, and I kept myself from mine iniquity.

tokens.t: I was also upright before him, and I kept myself from mine iniquity.

verses.plain: Therefore hath the LORD recompensed me according to my righteousness, according to the cleanness of my hands in his eyesight.

tokens.t: Therefore hath the
recompensed me according to my righteousness, according to the cleanness of my hands in his eyesight.

verses.plain: With the merciful thou wilt shew thyself merciful; with an upright man thou wilt shew thyself upright;

tokens.t: With the merciful thou wilt shew thyself merciful; with an upright man thou wilt shew thyself upright;

verses.plain: With the pure thou wilt shew thyself pure; and with the froward thou wilt shew thyself froward.

tokens.t: With the pure thou wilt shew thyself pure; and with the froward thou wilt shew thyself froward.

verses.plain: For thou wilt save the afflicted people; but wilt bring down high looks.

tokens.t: For thou wilt save the afflicted people; but wilt bring down high looks.

verses.plain: For thou wilt light my candle: the LORD my God will enlighten my darkness.

tokens.t: For thou wilt light my candle: the
my God will enlighten my darkness.

verses.plain: For by thee I have run through a troop; and by my God have I leaped over a wall.

tokens.t: For by thee I have run through a troop; and by my God have I leaped over a wall.

verses.plain: As for God, his way is perfect: the word of the LORD is tried: he is a buckler to all those that trust in him.

tokens.t: God, his way
perfect: the word of the
is tried: he
a buckler to all those that trust in him.

verses.plain: For who is God save the LORD? or who is a rock save our God?

tokens.t: For who
God save the
? or who
a rock save our God?

verses.plain: It is God that girdeth me with strength, and maketh my way perfect.

tokens.t: God that girdeth me with strength, and maketh my way perfect.

verses.plain: He maketh my feet like hinds’ feet, and setteth me upon my high places.

tokens.t: He maketh my feet like hinds’
, and setteth me upon my high places.

verses.plain: He teacheth my hands to war, so that a bow of steel is broken by mine arms.

tokens.t: He teacheth my hands to war, so that a bow of steel is broken by mine arms.

verses.plain: Thou hast also given me the shield of thy salvation: and thy right hand hath holden me up, and thy gentleness hath made me great.

tokens.t: Thou hast also given me the shield of thy salvation: and thy right hand hath holden me up, and thy gentleness hath made me great.

verses.plain: Thou hast enlarged my steps under me, that my feet did not slip.

tokens.t: Thou hast enlarged my steps under me, that my feet did not slip.

verses.plain: I have pursued mine enemies, and overtaken them: neither did I turn again till they were consumed.

tokens.t: I have pursued mine enemies, and overtaken them: neither did I turn again till they were consumed.

verses.plain: I have wounded them that they were not able to rise: they are fallen under my feet.

tokens.t: I have wounded them that they were not able to rise: they are fallen under my feet.

verses.plain: For thou hast girded me with strength unto the battle: thou hast subdued under me those that rose up against me.

tokens.t: For thou hast girded me with strength unto the battle: thou hast subdued under me those that rose up against me.

verses.plain: Thou hast also given me the necks of mine enemies; that I might destroy them that hate me.

tokens.t: Thou hast also given me the necks of mine enemies; that I might destroy them that hate me.

verses.plain: They cried, but there was none to save them: even unto the LORD, but he answered them not.

tokens.t: They cried, but
none to save
unto the
, but he answered them not.

verses.plain: Then did I beat them small as the dust before the wind: I did cast them out as the dirt in the streets.

tokens.t: Then did I beat them small as the dust before the wind: I did cast them out as the dirt in the streets.

verses.plain: Thou hast delivered me from the strivings of the people; and thou hast made me the head of the heathen: a people whom I have not known shall serve me.

tokens.t: Thou hast delivered me from the strivings of the people;
thou hast made me the head of the heathen: a people
I have not known shall serve me.

verses.plain: As soon as they hear of me, they shall obey me: the strangers shall submit themselves unto me.

tokens.t: As soon as they hear of me, they shall obey me: the strangers shall submit themselves unto me.

verses.plain: The strangers shall fade away, and be afraid out of their close places.

tokens.t: The strangers shall fade away, and be afraid out of their close places.

verses.plain: The LORD liveth; and blessed be my rock; and let the God of my salvation be exalted.

tokens.t: The
liveth; and blessed
my rock; and let the God of my salvation be exalted.

verses.plain: It is God that avengeth me, and subdueth the people under me.

tokens.t: God that avengeth me, and subdueth the people under me.

verses.plain: He delivereth me from mine enemies: yea, thou liftest me up above those that rise up against me: thou hast delivered me from the violent man.

tokens.t: He delivereth me from mine enemies: yea, thou liftest me up above those that rise up against me: thou hast delivered me from the violent man.

verses.plain: Therefore will I give thanks unto thee, O LORD, among the heathen, and sing praises unto thy name.

tokens.t: Therefore will I give thanks unto thee, O
, among the heathen, and sing praises unto thy name.

verses.plain: Great deliverance giveth he to his king; and sheweth mercy to his anointed, to David, and to his seed for evermore.

tokens.t: Great deliverance giveth he to his king; and sheweth mercy to his anointed, to David, and to his seed for evermore.

footnotes.text: out of his nostrils: Heb. by his, etc
thy gentleness…: or, with thy meekness thou hast multiplied me
As soon…: Heb. At the hearing of the ear
strangers: Heb. sons of the stranger
strangers: Heb. sons of the stranger
